actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Food and Agriculture Act of 1977 relating to increases in the target prices of the 1979 crops of wheat, corn and other crops under certain circumstances, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Agriculture Adjustment Act of 1979 - Amends the Food and Agriculture Act of 1977 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to increase the established prices for the 1979 crop of wheat to $3.63 per bushel and of corn to $2.35 per bushel, whenever a set-aside is in effect for the respective crop.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Food and Agriculture Act of 1977 relating to increases in the target prices of the 1979 crops of wheat, corn and other crops under certain circumstances, and for other purposes.
